abstract: Editorial urges Mayor Michael R Bloomberg to back the Lower Manhattan community board's resolution to address problems of noise, cleanliness and hygiene created by Occupy Wall Street protesters living in Zuccotti Park; argues that this is a good way to keep the peace with both local residents and the demonstrators.
snippet: The people most inconvenienced by the Occupy Wall Street protesters have a sensible resolution.
lead_paragraph: The people most inconvenienced by the Occupy Wall Street protesters have a sensible resolution.

headline.main: A Good Approach on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: A Good Approach on Wall Street
headline.seo: A Good Approach on Wall Street
